title: Time to share
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Community development
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Community welfare councils
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Public welfare - Australia
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Social problems
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Volunteer workers
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Social justice - Australia
description: Shows how voluntary workers undertake community work. Shows community aides working with underprivileged children, the sick, the elderly, migrants and unemployed teenagers. The community aides explain why they became voluntary community workers and outline the personal satisfaction they receive by giving their time to those who need assistance.
